title: Comprehensive Drug-Related Deaths Dashboard by State and Drug Type
description: This dashboard provides an overview of reported drug-related deaths across Australian states, with breakdowns by drug type and age group. It highlights key metrics and visualizes trends to support public health analysis and policy decisions.

cards.title: Total Reported Drug-Related Deaths
cards.description: Sum of all reported drug-related deaths across all states, years, and drug types.

cards.title: State with Highest Deaths
cards.description: The state with the highest total number of reported drug-related deaths.

cards.title: Most Prevalent Drug Type
cards.description: The drug type associated with the highest number of reported deaths.

charts.title: Reported Deaths by State and Drug Type
charts.description: Compares the total number of reported drug-related deaths across states, broken down by drug type.

charts.title: Trends in Drug-Related Deaths Over Years
charts.description: Shows the trend of reported drug-related deaths over the years for each drug type.

charts.title: Drug-Related Deaths by Age Group
charts.description: Distribution of reported drug-related deaths across different age groups.
